name: Santa goes to town
description:
Deliver the gifts to the houses in this very amazing 3D game (Isometric 3D by the way)!

Control Santa with the two mouse buttons, like a remote control car: Left mouse button, the Santa direction will rotate left, Right mouse button, the Santa direction will rotate right... 

Practice first, and when you get it, enjoy!

10 levels to complete, with only 20 lives!

Made with Love2D for the #LD34.
To contact me: @davidmekersa

Ludum Dare link :
